channel.title: Project Lost-Scape 525 =O!
channel.description:
[CENTER]Welcome at Project Lost-Scape
Im looking for some 525 coders so we build a good project [/CENTER]
[B][CENTER]What needs to be done: First 525 With NPC Combat Fixing %99 Percent Of Glitches Get Summoning Working Clan chat[/CENTER][/B]
[CENTER]What i have done so far..
Features: Donator zone with Custom Donator Shop and Weapons All GodSwords (SGS heals, ZGS freezes, BGS drains defence,) All Working Specs Herblore Added Fire Making Added Fletching Added Summoning Base Completed First 525 With In-Game Donator Shop Custom Special Attack On Donator Item's Great Player Economy.[/CENTER]
some pics..
Vesta Longsword [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/vnf0xu.gif[/img]
Dragon Claws [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/x1f09j.gif[/img]
Statius Warhammer [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/mt1tk.gif[/img]
Anchor Special [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/34qod2h.png[/img]
Ags special [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/15wicd0.gif[/img]
Bgs [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/2qi31a8.jpg[/img]
Sgs [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/14llcuw.jpg[/img]
[CENTER]Now comes the applications. By far, I will probably need a team of coders..[/CENTER]
[CENTER]CONTACT FOR MESSENGER:
AGE (optional):
EXPERIENCES:
POSITION APPLYING FOR:
Server Coders:
- - - - -
Client Coders: - - - - -
Beta Testers: - - - - -[/CENTER]
[CENTER]THanks..![/CENTER]
